full_summary:
=====================================

### Tender Notice for Opentext Rightfax Hardware

##### Publish Date and Closing Date

* Published: August 18, 2023
* Closing Date: August 31, 2023 (11:00 AM EST)

##### Tender Information

* Reference Number: SSC-23-00023588
* Solicitation Number: BPM019397/23588
* Amendment Number: 0 (No amendments)
* Notice Type: Request for Proposal
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Opportunity: Canada
* Regions of Delivery: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

##### Background and Scope

The Shared Services Canada is inviting proposals from qualified candidates to provide Opentext Rightfax Hardware solutions to support the organization's needs.

##### Key Requirements

* Delivery of Opentext Rightfax Hardware solutions to meet the optimization and maintenance requirements of the organization
* Meet the necessary specifications and standards for the proposed solutions

##### Evaluation Criteria

Note: Evaluation criteria information is not available in this tender posting.

##### Contact Information

* Contracting Entity: Shared Services Canada
* Contact Person: Dimeji Temidire
* Contact Email: [dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:dimeji.temidire@ssc-spc.gc.ca)
* Contact Phone: 613-618-2048
* Contact Fax: 999-999-9999
* Address: Minto Building, 180 Kent Street, Ottawa, Gatineau, QC, K1P 0B6
